channel.title: Andrei Popa - Personal Website

item.title: About
item.description: Favorite perspective on software development is that we build things with code. I enjoy chasing down and fixing bugs (it’s like a puzzle that requires a very good understanding of the system in order to do efficiently) and I’m a fan of keeping things organized. I’m taller than you (most likely). So far, I’ve mountain biked the best trails in the US, and I’m working on making that “the best trails in the world.
